[API docs by Redocly](https://redocly.com/redoc/)
# TidyCal API (0.1)
Download OpenAPI specification:Download
# [](#section/Introduction)Introduction
TidyCal's REST API provides a handful of endpoints which can be used to get information about your account and bookings. It uses conventional OAuth 2.0 protocol for authentication.
# [](#section/Authentication)Authentication
### Personal Access Token
Create a personal access token at [https://tidycal.com/integrations/oauth](https://tidycal.com/integrations/oauth). Once created, it can be used to authenticate requests by passing it in the `Authorization` header.
```
Authorization: Bearer {TOKEN}
```
### OAuth 2.0 Client
If you're building a custom integration to TidyCal which requires users to authenticate in order to get access tokens to make API requests on their behalf, you'll need to create an OAuth 2.0 client. This is easy to do from the "OAuth Apps" settings page found here [https://tidycal.com/integrations/oauth](https://tidycal.com/integrations/oauth)
Using the `authorization_code` grant type to authenticate users using OAuth 2.0 to retrieve an access token is fairly conventional, more information on that process can be found here: [https://www.oauth.com/oauth2-servers/server-side-apps/authorization-code/](https://www.oauth.com/oauth2-servers/server-side-apps/authorization-code/)
-   Authorization URL: [https://tidycal.com/oauth/authorize](https://tidycal.com/oauth/authorize)
-   Access Token URL: [https://tidycal.com/oauth/token](https://tidycal.com/oauth/token)
# [](#tag/Account)Account
## [](#tag/Account/operation/get-account)Account information
Get account details.
### Responses
**200**
OK
get/me
https://tidycal.com/api/me
### Response samples
-   200
Content type
application/json
Copy
`{  -   "name": "John Doe",      -   "email": "john@doe.com",      -   "lifetime_pro_at": "2022-01-01T00:00:00Z",      -   "vanity_path": "johndoe",      -   "language": "en",      -   "profile_picture_url": "[https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/202446b468bec26847368d8a214b80c9?d=blank&s=200](https://www.gravatar.com/avatar/202446b468bec26847368d8a214b80c9?d=blank&s=200)",      -   "currency_symbol": "$"       }`
# [](#tag/Bookings)Bookings
## [](#tag/Bookings/operation/list-bookings)List bookings
Get a list of bookings.
##### path Parameters
| starts\_at |
date
Get bookings starting from a specific date.
 |
| ends\_at |
date
Get bookings ending before a specific date.
 |
| cancelled |
boolean
Get only cancelled bookings.
 |
| page |
number
Page number.
 |
| include\_teams |
boolean
Include team bookings.
 |
### Responses
**200**
OK
get/bookings
https://tidycal.com/api/bookings
### Response samples
-   200
Content type
application/json
Copy
Expand all Collapse all
`{  -   "data": [          -   {                  -   "id": 1,                      -   "contact_id": 1,                      -   "booking_type_id": 1,                      -   "starts_at": "2022-01-01T00:00:00Z",                      -   "ends_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",                      -   "cancelled_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",                      -   "created_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",                      -   "updated_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",                      -   "timezone": "America/Los_Angeles",                      -   "meeting_url": "[https://zoom.us/j/949494949494](https://zoom.us/j/949494949494)",                      -   "meeting_id": "fw44lkj48fks",                      -   "questions": [                          -   {                                  -   "id": 1,                                      -   "booking_id": 1,                                      -   "question": "What is your favorite color?",                                      -   "answer": "Blue",                                      -   "created_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",                                      -   "updated_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"                                                       }                                           ],                      -   "contact": {                          -   "id": 1,                              -   "name": "John Doe",                              -   "email": "john@doe.com",                              -   "phone_number": "+1234567890",                              -   "ip_address": "127.0.0.1",                              -   "timezone": "America/New_York",                              -   "created_at": "2022-01-01T00:00:00Z",                              -   "updated_at": "2022-01-01T00:00:00Z"                                           },                      -   "payment": {                          -   "id": 1,                              -   "payment_id": "pi_1234567890",                              -   "booking_id": 1,                              -   "amount": 1,                              -   "currency": "USD",                              -   "created_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",                              -   "updated_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"                                           }                               }                   ]       }`
## [](#tag/Bookings/operation/get-booking)Get booking
Get a booking by ID.
##### path Parameters
| booking
required
 |
integer
The ID of the booking.
 |
### Responses
**200**
OK
**403**
Forbidden - User does not have permission to view this booking
**404**
Not Found - Booking not found
**422**
Validation Error
get/bookings/{booking}
https://tidycal.com/api/bookings/{booking}
### Response samples
-   200
Content type
application/json
Copy
Expand all Collapse all
`{  -   "id": 1,      -   "contact_id": 1,      -   "booking_type_id": 1,      -   "starts_at": "2022-01-01T00:00:00Z",      -   "ends_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",      -   "cancelled_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",      -   "created_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",      -   "updated_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",      -   "timezone": "America/Los_Angeles",      -   "meeting_url": "[https://zoom.us/j/949494949494](https://zoom.us/j/949494949494)",      -   "meeting_id": "fw44lkj48fks",      -   "questions": [          -   {                  -   "id": 1,                      -   "booking_id": 1,                      -   "question": "What is your favorite color?",                      -   "answer": "Blue",                      -   "created_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",                      -   "updated_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"                               }                   ],      -   "contact": {          -   "id": 1,              -   "name": "John Doe",              -   "email": "john@doe.com",              -   "phone_number": "+1234567890",              -   "ip_address": "127.0.0.1",              -   "timezone": "America/New_York",              -   "created_at": "2022-01-01T00:00:00Z",              -   "updated_at": "2022-01-01T00:00:00Z"                   },      -   "payment": {          -   "id": 1,              -   "payment_id": "pi_1234567890",              -   "booking_id": 1,              -   "amount": 1,              -   "currency": "USD",              -   "created_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",              -   "updated_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"                   }       }`
## [](#tag/Bookings/operation/cancel-booking)Cancel booking
Cancel a booking by ID.
##### path Parameters
| booking
required
 |
integer
The ID of the booking to cancel.
 |
##### Request Body schema: application/json
| reason |
string
Optional reason for cancellation
 |
### Responses
**200**
OK
**400**
Bad Request - Booking is already cancelled
**403**
Forbidden - User does not have permission to cancel this booking
**404**
Not Found - Booking not found
patch/bookings/{booking}/cancel
https://tidycal.com/api/bookings/{booking}/cancel
### Request samples
-   Payload
Content type
application/json
Copy
`{  -   "reason": "Client requested cancellation"       }`
### Response samples
-   200
Content type
application/json
Copy
Expand all Collapse all
`{  -   "id": 1,      -   "contact_id": 1,      -   "booking_type_id": 1,      -   "starts_at": "2022-01-01T00:00:00Z",      -   "ends_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",      -   "cancelled_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",      -   "created_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",      -   "updated_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",      -   "timezone": "America/Los_Angeles",      -   "meeting_url": "[https://zoom.us/j/949494949494](https://zoom.us/j/949494949494)",      -   "meeting_id": "fw44lkj48fks",      -   "questions": [          -   {                  -   "id": 1,                      -   "booking_id": 1,                      -   "question": "What is your favorite color?",                      -   "answer": "Blue",                      -   "created_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",                      -   "updated_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"                               }                   ],      -   "contact": {          -   "id": 1,              -   "name": "John Doe",              -   "email": "john@doe.com",              -   "phone_number": "+1234567890",              -   "ip_address": "127.0.0.1",              -   "timezone": "America/New_York",              -   "created_at": "2022-01-01T00:00:00Z",              -   "updated_at": "2022-01-01T00:00:00Z"                   },      -   "payment": {          -   "id": 1,              -   "payment_id": "pi_1234567890",              -   "booking_id": 1,              -   "amount": 1,              -   "currency": "USD",              -   "created_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",              -   "updated_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"                   }       }`
# [](#tag/Booking-Types)Booking Types
## [](#tag/Booking-Types/operation/list-booking-types)List booking types
Get a list of booking types.
##### path Parameters
| page |
number
Page number.
 |
### Responses
**200**
OK
get/booking-types
https://tidycal.com/api/booking-types
### Response samples
-   200
Content type
application/json
Copy
Expand all Collapse all
`{  -   "data": [          -   {                  -   "id": 1,                      -   "user_id": 1,                      -   "title": "15 Minute Meeting",                      -   "duration_minutes": 15,                      -   "padding_minutes": 10,                      -   "disabled_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",                      -   "created_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",                      -   "updated_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",                      -   "url_slug": "15-minute-meeting",                      -   "description": "Book a meeting with me for 15 minutes!",                      -   "price": 10,                      -   "private": false,                      -   "latest_availability_days": 60,                      -   "redirect_url": "[https://mywebsite.com](https://mywebsite.com)",                      -   "booking_threshold_minutes": 120,                      -   "max_bookings": 1,                      -   "url": "[http://tidycal.com/johndoe/15-minute-meeting](http://tidycal.com/johndoe/15-minute-meeting)"                               }                   ]       }`
## [](#tag/Booking-Types/operation/create-booking-type)Create booking type
Create a new booking type.
##### Request Body schema: application/json
| title
required
 |
string <= 191 characters
 |
| description
required
 |
string <html\>
 |
| duration\_minutes
required
 |
integer \>= 1
 |
| url\_slug
required
 |
string <= 191 characters
 |
| padding\_minutes |
integer \>= 0
Default: 0
 |
| latest\_availability\_days |
integer \[ 0 .. 36500 \]
Default: 60
 |
| private |
boolean
Default: false
 |
| max\_bookings |
integer \>= 1
Default: 1
 |
| max\_guest\_invites\_per\_booker |
integer \[ 0 .. 10 \]
Default: 0
 |
| display\_seats\_remaining |
boolean
Default: false
 |
| booking\_availability\_interval\_minutes |
integer \[ 15 .. 1440 \]
Default: 15
 |
| redirect\_url |
string or null <= 60000 characters
 |
| approval\_required |
boolean or null
 |
| booking\_type\_category\_id |
integer or null
 |
### Responses
**201**
Created
**422**
Validation Error
post/booking-types
https://tidycal.com/api/booking-types
### Request samples
-   Payload
Content type
application/json
Copy
`{  -   "title": "30 Minute Meeting",      -   "description": "Book a 30 minute meeting with me",      -   "duration_minutes": 30,      -   "url_slug": "30-minute-meeting",      -   "padding_minutes": 15,      -   "latest_availability_days": 90,      -   "private": false,      -   "max_bookings": 1,      -   "max_guest_invites_per_booker": 0,      -   "display_seats_remaining": false,      -   "booking_availability_interval_minutes": 30,      -   "redirect_url": "[https://example.com/thank-you](https://example.com/thank-you)",      -   "approval_required": false,      -   "booking_type_category_id": 1       }`
### Response samples
-   201
Content type
application/json
Copy
Expand all Collapse all
`{  -   "data": {          -   "id": 1,              -   "user_id": 1,              -   "title": "15 Minute Meeting",              -   "duration_minutes": 15,              -   "padding_minutes": 10,              -   "disabled_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",              -   "created_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",              -   "updated_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",              -   "url_slug": "15-minute-meeting",              -   "description": "Book a meeting with me for 15 minutes!",              -   "price": 10,              -   "private": false,              -   "latest_availability_days": 60,              -   "redirect_url": "[https://mywebsite.com](https://mywebsite.com)",              -   "booking_threshold_minutes": 120,              -   "max_bookings": 1,              -   "url": "[http://tidycal.com/johndoe/15-minute-meeting](http://tidycal.com/johndoe/15-minute-meeting)"                   }       }`
## [](#tag/Booking-Types/operation/list-booking-type-timeslots)List available timeslots
Get a list of available timeslots for a specific booking type.
##### path Parameters
| bookingType
required
 |
integer
The ID of the booking type.
 |
##### query Parameters
| starts\_at
required
 |
string <date-time\>
Start date to get timeslots from (UTC).
 |
| ends\_at
required
 |
string <date-time\>
End date to get timeslots until (UTC).
 |
### Responses
**200**
OK
get/booking-types/{bookingType}/timeslots
https://tidycal.com/api/booking-types/{bookingType}/timeslots
### Response samples
-   200
Content type
application/json
Copy
Expand all Collapse all
`{  -   "data": [          -   {                  -   "starts_at": "2024-03-20T10:00:00Z",                      -   "ends_at": "2024-03-20T10:30:00Z",                      -   "available_bookings": 1                               }                   ]       }`
## [](#tag/Booking-Types/operation/create-booking)Create booking
Create a new booking for a specific booking type.
##### path Parameters
| bookingType
required
 |
integer
The ID of the booking type.
 |
##### Request Body schema: application/json
| starts\_at
required
 |
string <date-time\>
The start time of the booking in UTC
 |
| name
required
 |
string <= 191 characters
Name of the person making the booking
 |
| email
required
 |
string <email\> <= 191 characters
Email of the person making the booking
 |
| timezone
required
 |
string <= 191 characters
The timezone of the booking
 |
| booking\_questions |
Array of objects
Answers to booking type questions
 |
### Responses
**201**
Created
**403**
Forbidden - User does not have permission to create bookings for this booking type
**409**
Conflict - The timeslot is not available
**422**
Validation Error
post/booking-types/{bookingType}/bookings
https://tidycal.com/api/booking-types/{bookingType}/bookings
### Request samples
-   Payload
Content type
application/json
Copy
Expand all Collapse all
`{  -   "starts_at": "2024-03-20T10:00:00Z",      -   "name": "John Doe",      -   "email": "john@example.com",      -   "timezone": "America/Los_Angeles",      -   "booking_questions": [          -   {                  -   "booking_type_question_id": 1,                      -   "answer": "My answer"                               }                   ]       }`
### Response samples
-   201
Content type
application/json
Copy
Expand all Collapse all
`{  -   "data": {          -   "id": 1,              -   "contact_id": 1,              -   "booking_type_id": 1,              -   "starts_at": "2022-01-01T00:00:00Z",              -   "ends_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",              -   "cancelled_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",              -   "created_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",              -   "updated_at": "2022-02-01T00:00:00Z",              -   "timezone": "America/Los_Angeles",              -   "meeting_url": "[https://zoom.us/j/949494949494](https://zoom.us/j/949494949494)",              -   "meeting_id": "fw44lkj48fks",              -   "questions": [                  -   {                          -   "id": 1,                              -   "booking_id": 1,                              -   "question": "What is your favorite color?",                              -   "answer": "Blue",                              -   "created_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",                              -   "updated_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"                                           }                               ],              -   "contact": {                  -   "id": 1,                      -   "name": "John Doe",                      -   "email": "john@doe.com",                      -   "phone_number": "+1234567890",                      -   "ip_address": "127.0.0.1",                      -   "timezone": "America/New_York",                      -   "created_at": "2022-01-01T00:00:00Z",                      -   "updated_at": "2022-01-01T00:00:00Z"                               },              -   "payment": {                  -   "id": 1,                      -   "payment_id": "pi_1234567890",                      -   "booking_id": 1,                      -   "amount": 1,                      -   "currency": "USD",                      -   "created_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z",                      -   "updated_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00Z"                               }                   }       }`

## [](#tag/Teams/operation/list-team-bookings)List team bookings
Get a list of bookings for a specific team.
##### path Parameters
| team
required
 |
integer
The ID of the team.
 |
##### query Parameters
| page |
number
Page number.
 |
| start\_date |
string <date\>
Get bookings starting from a specific date.
 |
| end\_date |
string <date\>
Get bookings ending before a specific date.
 |
| email |
string <email\>
Get bookings for a specific email address.
 |
| host\_id |
integer
Get bookings for a specific user ID.
 |
### Responses
**200**
OK
**403**
Forbidden - User does not have permission to view this team
**404**
Not Found - Team not found
get/teams/{team}/bookings
https://tidycal.com/api/teams/{team}/bookings

## [](#tag/Teams/operation/list-team-users)List team users
Get a list of users in a specific team.
##### path Parameters
| team
required
 |
integer
The ID of the team.
 |
| page |
number
Page number.
 |
### Responses
**200**
OK
**403**
Forbidden - User does not have permission to view this team
**404**
Not Found - Team not found
get/teams/{team}/users
https://tidycal.com/api/teams/{team}/users

Content type
application/json
Copy

## [](#tag/Teams/operation/add-team-user)Add user to team
Add a user to a team by sending an invitation email.
##### path Parameters
| team
required
 |
integer
The ID of the team.
 |
##### Request Body schema: application/json
| email
required
 |
string <email\>
Email address of the user to invite
 |
| role\_name |
string
Enum: "admin" "user"
Role name for the user in the team
 |
### Responses
**200**
OK
**403**
Forbidden - User does not have permission to add users to this team
**404**
Not Found - Team not found
**422**
Validation Error - User already invited or already a member
post/teams/{team}/users
https://tidycal.com/api/teams/{team}/users
### Request samples
-   Payload
Content type
application/json
Copy
`{  -   "email": "user@example.com",      -   "role_name": "user"       }`
### Response samples
-   200
Content type
application/json
Copy
`{  -   "message": "Invitation sent successfully",      -   "team_user_id": 123       }`
## [](#tag/Teams/operation/remove-team-user)Remove user from team
Remove a user from a team.
##### path Parameters
| team
required
 |
integer
The ID of the team.
 |
| teamUser
required
 |
integer
The ID of the team user to remove.
 |
### Responses
**200**
OK
**403**
Forbidden - User does not have permission to remove users from this team
**404**
Not Found - Team or team user not found
**422**

## [](#tag/Teams/operation/create-team-booking-type)Create team booking type
Create a new booking type for a specific team.
##### path Parameters
| team
required
 |
integer
The ID of the team.
 |
##### Request Body schema: application/json
| title
required
 |
string <= 191 characters
 |
| description
required
 |
string <html\>
 |
| duration\_minutes
required
 |
integer \>= 1
 |
| url\_slug
required
 |
string <= 191 characters
 |
| padding\_minutes |
integer \>= 0
Default: 0
 |
| latest\_availability\_days |
integer \[ 0 .. 36500 \]
Default: 60
 |
| private |
boolean
Default: false
 |
| max\_bookings |
integer \>= 1
Default: 1
 |
| max\_guest\_invites\_per\_booker |
integer \[ 0 .. 10 \]
Default: 0
 |
| display\_seats\_remaining |
boolean
Default: false
 |
| booking\_availability\_interval\_minutes |
integer \[ 15 .. 1440 \]
Default: 15
 |
| redirect\_url |
string or null <= 60000 characters
 |
| approval\_required |
boolean or null
 |
| booking\_type\_category\_id |
integer or null
 |
### Responses
**201**
Created
**403**
Forbidden - User does not have permission to create booking types for this team
**404**
Not Found - Team not found
**422**
Validation Error
post/teams/{team}/booking-types
https://tidycal.com/api/teams/{team}/booking-types
### Request samples
-   Payload
Content type
application/json
Copy
`{  -   "title": "30 Minute Meeting",      -   "description": "Book a 30 minute meeting with me",      -   "duration_minutes": 30,      -   "url_slug": "30-minute-meeting",      -   "padding_minutes": 15,      -   "latest_availability_days": 90,      -   "private": false,      -   "max_bookings": 1,      -   "max_guest_invites_per_booker": 0,      -   "display_seats_remaining": false,      -   "booking_availability_interval_minutes": 30,      -   "redirect_url": "[https://example.com/thank-you](https://example.com/thank-you)",      -   "approval_required": false,      -   "booking_type_category_id": 1       }`
### Response samples
